        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('ast_contract');
if (gr.get(current.contract)) {
 
 var ga = new GlideAggregate('fm_contract_rate_card');
 ga.addQuery('contract', current.contract);
 ga.addQuery('active', 'true');
 ga.addAggregate('SUM', 'base_cost');
 ga.addAggregate('SUM', 'amount');
 ga.addAggregate('SUM', 'tax_cost');
 ga.groupBy('contract');
 ga.query();

 var base = 0;
 var amount = 0;
 var tax_cost = 0;
 var tax_rate = 0;
 if (ga.next()) {
     base = ga.getAggregate('SUM', 'base_cost');
     amount = ga.getAggregate('SUM', 'amount');
     tax_cost = ga.getAggregate('SUM', 'tax_cost');
     tax_rate = (tax_cost/(base/100))
     gr.setValue('ratecard', true);
 } else
  gr.setValue('ratecard', false);

 gr.setValue('payment_amount', gr.payment_amount.getReferenceCurrencyCode()+";"+parseFloat(base));
 gr.setValue('total_cost',gr.total_cost.getReferenceCurrencyCode()+";"+parseFloat(amount));
 gr.setValue('tax_cost', gr.tax_cost.getReferenceCurrencyCode()+";"+parseFloat(tax_cost));
 gr.setValue('tax_rate', tax_rate);
 gr.update();
}]]></script>
